captions.text: Stand up, the four of you.

How does it work?
You all wrote scene suggestions

and put them in this red box,
I'll read them to the players

and they will improvise the first crap
that comes to their heads. Okay?

Looking at this side,
we're kinda of attracted...

'Worst things to see
after waking up from a coma'
Let's see who won the election...
'What not to do in a supermarket'

I guess that was the worst scene
we have ever done in "Improvável".

Sorry, guys.
That was the worst.

'What can you say about your glasses
but not about your girlfriend'

They gave me this spray,
it gets clean in a second!
Damn, I'll have to screw it again!
I had to change it after my last exam.

I put this chain in both legs
so I wouldn't miss it, see?
It's ugly as hell, but it was real cheap!
I always wanted to do this!
And she's buying a stairway to heaven...

I'll send another tsunami,
that'll teach you...

- Is this heaven?
- Life is like a box of chocolates, isn't it?
